modName: Lesser Blur Patch for Green Water Fix
summary: Weakens, or removes underwater blurring after installing \"GreenWaterFix\".
descriptionHtml:
Name: Lesser Blur Patch for Green Water Fix
Version: 1.0
Date: 4/17/2012
Category: Miscellaneous
Author: AltheaR


Description
===========
Weakens, or removes underwater blurring after installing \"GreenWaterFix\".
[size=3][color=#c3d825][b]Works also without \"GreenWaterFix\".[/b][/color][/size]

Details
=======
I changed ONLY the values of \"Blur Strength\" in \"UnderwaterImageSpace\".
Load AFTER \"Green Water Fix\", please.(Of course you need \"Green Water Fix\" mod.)


Load Order Example:
GreenWaterFix.esp (or GreenWaterFixForWATER.esp)

(some other esps)

GreenWaterFix_LesserBlurPatch.esp (or GreenWaterFix_CrystalClearPatch.esp)



Incompatibility
===============
Any mods changing \"UnderwaterImageSpace\".



Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to skyrim.nexusmods.com
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.


Tools Used
==========
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
Creation Kit


Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that 
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.
I would also like to know what mods are including my work.
author: AltheaR
